title: Boy, 15, shot in Austin
content:
A 15-year-old boy was shot Saturday afternoon in the Austin neighborhood on the West Side.
The boy was outside at 12:52 p.m. in the 5600 block of West Corcoran when an altercation began inside a nearby business, according to Chicago Police. The altercation then moved outside and shots were fired, striking the boy in the abdomen.
He was taken to Stroger Hospital in serious condition, police said.
